abstract: Macedonian opposition party leader Zoran Zaev is indicted shortly after announcing plans for mass protest in capital of Skopje; he is charged with wiretapping and 'violence against representatives of the highest authorities.'
lead_paragraph: The leader of the left-wing Social Democratic Union of Macedonia, Zoran Zaev, has produced what he says is evidence of official corruption.

headline.main: Macedonia Indicts Opposition Leader Who Denounced Graft
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Macedonia: Opposition Leader Is Indicted in Wiretapping Case

snippet: The leader of the left-wing Social Democratic Union of Macedonia, Zoran Zaev, has produced what he says is evidence of official corruption.

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
